about: Booking: hmbbooking@gmail.com                                 All other inquiries: hungrymarchband@gmail.com
artists_we_like: RMO, EE, Samenakoa, Titubanda, Pustule, What Cheer, March Fourth, Extra Action, Hot 8, ReBirth, Youngblood, Mucca Pazza, Os Sedrais, Perhaps Contraption
bio: Fear shall lead you to the place you most need to be. When you arrive, dive into the sea of the unknown, we will be there cheering you on, furiously playing in a state of absolute delightful madness.
description:
Book us!  hmbbooking@gmail.com

All other inquiries: hungrymarchband@gmail.com
influences: City streets in the summer; old-time jazz and the sound of jazz to come. We are good and bad influences on each other in equal measure, and all 20+ of us are always bringing things to the table: Ellington, Mingus, a nice paté, SunRa, Pig Bag, the Clash, some spiced rum, Black Sabbath, Prince Buster, Goran Bregovic, or what grew out of our own individual gardens or collective heads.
name: Hungry March Band
